channel.title: Paths are made by walking.

item.title: FortiGate SSH Keys for administrative Access
item.description: Introduction to SSH OpenSSH is the premier connectivity tool for remote login with the SSH protocol. It encrypts all traffic to eliminate eavesdropping, connection hijacking, and other attacks. That’s a cite from the official OpenSSH Webpage and also OpenSSH as for today is a very common type of connection to routers, switches, firewalls and so on. What we’re going to cover in this post is how to connect to a FortiGate device as an administrative User via ssh(1)
